name: Match strings
description: Matches single line strings between single or double quotes
content:
class Thing
  name: "unknown"
"\tasd"
@something_else

teste = (something) ->
'teste'
class Person extends Thing
  say_name: => print "Hello, 'hooray' I am".."something else", @name

with Person!
  .name = "MoonScript"
  \say_name!
author: Otto Robba
